page.title: 15AMMENITIES
page.content: {Surgery}Dr.R.Ward/Dr.P.Robinson {School}Headteacher-Mr.K.Tingay{ {Village Hall} Used for Playgroup,School P.E.,Youth Club,Scouts,W.I.,Young Farmers,Clinic Farmers,Dances,Fund raising events. Sport-football,Cricket,Bowls in the surrounding field. Built19 .Sec.Mr.E.Close {Old School}(Reading Room) used for Over 60's club and Venture Scout H.Q. {Fire Station}Part time fire crews-2 fire engines-Captain Mr.Bell(Plumber) {St.Stephen's Ch.}Vicar-Rev.C.Forster The Church has Norman Lytch Gate which is the only remains of the old church {Snainton Methodist Chapel}Built part of the Sherburn Circuit and the surviving one of 2 in the village. The other now used for a workshop by F.Stockill and Son,builders.
